data.text: @davidkingtheo @kanyewest @KimKardashian So this is how #Nigeria is treating the people who gave this World first #oil...disgusting, don't you think @antonioguterres @Shell @UN_PGA @UNEnvironment @EmmanuelMacron @theresa_may @BorisJohnson @MBuhari be ashamed of your actions, ask for #forgiveness @POTUS @IvankaTrump see?

@JencaBenca @kanyewest @KimKardashian Lavishing, drowning in the flood #Biafra #Anambra #Aguleri we want your collaboration to extend your generosity to the neglected by the government of the colonialists #FactsAreFacts https://t.co/C3ixDwIBGu
